Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma mentioned that the Indian team is preparing to counter the Afghan challenge in the Super 8 opener.
The Indian batters have played the Afghanistan players often in the IPL and might read them well.
With the Caribbean tracks favouring the spinners, India need to be at the top of their game to counter the Afghan challenge.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian team is currently stationed in Barbados and are gearing up for the Super 8 round.
India play Afghanistan in their first Super 8 round match.
The Indian team is preparing for the next two games in a span of 3 or 4 days.
Others: Rinku Singh rolling his arm over in the Team India nets is a sign that he is waiting for his chance to come by in the ongoing World Cup.
